title: How to Activate HBO Go on PC or Mac

steps.title: Go to https://www.max.com in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.max.com in a web browser. If you subscribe to HBO Go through your TV provider, you can use this method to start watching shows and movies on your computer. If you want to activate HBO Go for an external device like a smart TV, TiVo, or Roku, see this method.

steps.title: Click Sign In.
steps.content: Click Sign In . It’s at the top-right corner of the page. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Select your TV provider.
steps.content: Select your TV provider. If you don’t see its logo or icon, select it from the drop-down menu under ″All Providers.″

steps.title: Sign in to your TV provider.
steps.content: Sign in to your TV provider. You’ll use the username and password you created with your TV provider. If you don’t know this information, contact your provider.

steps.title: Create an HBO Go ID.
steps.content: Create an HBO Go ID. This is the 3-14 character username that will appear on your profile. If you’ve already created an ID you won’t be prompted to do so again.

steps.title: Enter your email address and zip code.
steps.content: Enter your email address and zip code. This is not required.

steps.title: Click Save.
steps.content: Click Save . Your HBOGO.com account is now active.

steps.title: Download the HBO Go app on your internet-enable TV.
steps.content: Download the HBO Go app on your internet-enable TV. If you plan to watch HBO on an internet TV device like a Samsung TV, Fire TV, or TiVo, you’ll need to install the app and then activate your HBO account at HBOGo.com. This method walks you through the process.

steps.title: Open the HBO Go app on the TV.
steps.content: Open the HBO Go app on the TV.

steps.title: Select Sign In.
steps.content: Select Sign In . This might be called Activate or Activate your device on some systems. This displays an activation code on the screen. You’ll need to enter this code on your computer. The code will expire after 15 minutes.

steps.title: Go to the Activate HBO Go page in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to the Activate HBO Go page in a web browser.

steps.title: Select your device from the drop-down menu.
steps.content: Select your device from the drop-down menu.

steps.title: Click Continue.
steps.content: Click Continue . A list of TV providers will appear.

steps.title: Select your TV provider.
steps.content: Select your TV provider. If you don’t see its logo or icon, select it from the drop-down menu under ″All Providers.″

steps.title: Sign in to your TV provider.
steps.content: Sign in to your TV provider. You’ll use the username and password you created with your TV provider. If you don’t know this information, contact your provider.

steps.title: Enter the activation code.
steps.content: Enter the activation code. This is the code that’s displayed on your internet-enabled TV.

steps.title: Click Activate Device.
steps.content: Click Activate Device . Once the activation is complete, you’ll see a ″Success″ message on the TV and on the website. You can now start watching HBO Go.
